Because ESRS E1-E5, S1-S4 have numerous other references to ‘resources allocated’ when
requiring disclosures, they are not replicated in this background section (see the ESRS reference

Annex II Acronyms and Glossary of Terms defines ‘marine resources’ and ‘natural resources’.
